```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

rm(list = ls())

library(sf)
library(osmdata)
library(tidyverse)
library(rnaturalearth)
```

### Get spatial data from OSM

```{r}
outline   <-ne_states(country = 'bahrain', returnclass='sf') %>% 
              select(name_en) %>% 
              mutate(pop = c(547983, 342315, 287434, 287434, 245994),
                     name = c('Capital', 'Northern', 'Southern', 'Southern', 'Muharraq')) %>%
              select(pop, name)
              aggregate(outline, by = c('name'), mean)



roads     <- opq(bbox = st_bbox(outline)) %>% add_osm_feature(key = "highway", value = c("trunk", "primary", "motorway")) %>% osmdata_sf()
roads     <- roads$osm_lines

buildings <- opq(bbox = st_bbox(outline)) %>% add_osm_feature(key = "building") %>% osmdata_sf()
buildings <- buildings$osm_polygons
```
